document_data.name: Mystra's Mantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Mystra's Mantle''' was a temple to [[Mystra]] in [[Haramettur]] during the mid–-8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The priests were capable of some castings.
document_data.History: The sage [[Tabarast]] attested in the {{yearlinkName|761}}, that the priests at Mystra's Mantle in Haramettur were not great casters, and also, that they'd told him of matters regarding a [[Chosen of Mystra]], the [[Elminster Aumar|One Who Walks]].
